services.title: Library
services.description: To borrow documents from the National Library you need a library card, which you can obtain free of charge.

services.title: Digital collections
services.description: The National Library’s digital collections can be accessed online via a range of portals and databases.

services.title: Using the Prints and Drawings Collection
services.description: Documents from the Prints and Drawings Department can be consulted free of charge.

services.title: Using the SLA
services.description: The holdings of the Swiss Literary Archives are publicly accessible and can be consulted for example for academic and literary research.

services.title: Data protection
services.description: The National Library respects and protects its users’ rights in respect of data protection and privacy.

services.title: BibliOpass
services.description: BibliOpass gives you access to more than 500 institutions and libraries in Switzerland with a single user card.
